articles.title: NASA Achieves 98% Water Recovery Rate on the ISS by Recycling All Astronaut Pee, Sweat - Tech Times
articles.description: NASA said the International Space Station (ISS) had achieved a 98% water recovery rate using a system that includes astronauts' pee and sweat recycling.
articles.content:
NASA has revealed that the International Space Station (ISS) is recycling 98% of all water astronauts bring onboard the station.
